Battleship

Interface User

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Computer, Player

    public interface User
    This interface is inherited all the players that are playing. Currently only Computer and Player have it. It's main purpose is organization because it only has 1 method that the instances of this interface have to implement.
    Version:
    May 30, 2019
    Author:
    Santosh, Period: 5, Assignment: Batttleship_APCSFinalProject, Sources:

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setShips(Ship[] ships)
      This abstract method is to be defined by each User for its own needs.
      void setShipsHelper(Ship s)
      This method randomly generates a number between 0 and 1.

    • Method Detail

      • setShips

        void setShips(Ship[] ships)
        This abstract method is to be defined by each User for its own needs.
        Parameters:
        ships - Ship[] that contains all the ships that needs to be placed

      • setShipsHelper

        void setShipsHelper(Ship s)
        This method randomly generates a number between 0 and 1. If the number is 1, the ships are placed horizontally. It generates another random location and if the ships are placed outside the bounds, it will calculate a new location for the ships to be placed at. If 0, it will place ships vertically with the same logic.
        Parameters:
        s - the ship to be placed
